allowlist.description: Global allowlists for false positives and safe paths/files.

rules.description: Exposure of a 1Password service account token can grant full access to secrets stored in 1Password vaults. **Critical: Immediate revocation required.**
Adafruit API keys allow control over Adafruit IO services. **High: Rotate if exposed.**
Adobe OAuth client IDs are used for API authentication. **Medium: Monitor for misuse.**
Adobe client secrets are used for OAuth flows. **High: Rotate if leaked.**
Age secret keys are used for file encryption. **Critical: Compromise allows decryption of sensitive data.**
Airtable API keys allow full access to Airtable bases. **High: Rotate immediately.**
Algolia API keys allow search operations and data access. **Medium: Restrict and rotate if exposed.**
Alibaba Cloud AccessKey IDs are used for API authentication. **High: Rotate if leaked.**
Alibaba Cloud Secret Keys grant full access to cloud resources. **Critical: Immediate action required.**
Asana client IDs are used for OAuth flows. **Medium: Monitor for misuse.**
Asana client secrets are used for OAuth flows. **High: Rotate if exposed.**
